Title: Marvel One-Shot: Item 47
Actors: Lizzy Caplan, Jesse Bradford, Maximiliano Hernández, Titus Welliver
Plot: This film shows a couple - Claire and Benny - robbing banks with a piece of alien technology that they've recovered from the New York battle site. Eventually we see them in a motel room with a load of money. Their neighbor starts playing music really loud. Benny goes out to investigate, but doesn't return.
